trans_title: 航拍城市24小时 第一季
introduction: They tower over hills and lakes, turn the night into a feast of lights, and lure people in by the millions. These are America's most prominent cities, all captured from breathtaking heights. From the creators of Aerial America, this adventure takes you on epic, sky-high journeys over Las Vegas, Chicago, Seattle, Miami, San Francisco, and Los Angeles. Celebrate the nation's most treasured and bustling metropolises and the people who keep them running.
chinese_title: 航拍城市24小时 第一季
